english.segment1: Did you think you were immune to this?. Did you think you could escape without infection?. You do all you're able to resist just to avoid the danger of rejection
english.segment2: Memory warns you of the past when it all went wrong
english.segment3: When you think your life is shattered. And there's no way to be fixed again. Love heals your heart. At a time you least expected. You're alive like you have never been. Love heals your heart
english.segment4: Everybody has a wall to climb. That was built to guard the pain that hold them captive. Every smile that they would hide behind. Will try to mask the hurt beneath the surface
english.segment5: Sometimes, it's hard to understand how we're trapped inside.
